title: Adobe InDesign CC 2014 (v10.2.0) x86-x64 RUS-ENG Update 2 by m0n
description:
Adobe InDesign CC 2014 (v10.2.0) x86-x64 RUS / ENG Update 2

Adobe InDesign CC 2014
Year of release : 2015
Version : 2014.2 (10.2.0.69)
Developer : Adobe
By assembling : m0nkrus & PAINTER
Platform : Windows x86-x64
Compatible with Seven : full
Language : English + Russian
Medicine : Present System requirements:

- Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon 64
- Microsoft Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8 or Windows 8.1
- 2 GB of RAM (8 GB recommended)
- 2.6 GB free hard disk space for installation; additional free space required during installation (can not install on removable storage devices based on flash memory)
- Screen resolution of 1024 x 768 (1280 x 800 recommended) with 32-bit video card
- To export SWF files requires software Adobe Flash Player 10
- Internet connection to register and activate the necessary software, check the status of the subscriber and access to online services Description:

Adobe InDesign CC 2014 - a professional product design to design any print or online publications. Adobe InDesign CC 2014 has all the innovative features and tools, machine layout,
with which you can quickly and efficiently design the pages of any complexity. The program supports the import of pictures and text from a variety of formats,
including PDF and XML files, offers a set of tools for editing imported materials, which includes work with layers, cascading styles, tables, and templates.
Adobe InDesign CC 2014 is a universal app for publication content that provides precise control over typography and design pixel-level. Convenient adaptation to different layouts page size,
orientation and devices while maintaining high image quality. Adobe InDesign CC 2014 is part of the Creative Cloud. Therefore, its users have access to all the latest updates,
and access to new versions available from the date of their issue. Improve your skills and master new tools thanks to the large and ever-growing collection of instructional videos.
Through integration with the Behance can share their projects with other users and receive instant feedback on their work from designers around the world.

What changed me:

- From the original ESD-distribution, containing Russian and English languages, removed all other language packs.
- 32-bit and 64-bit distributions are combined in a single installer.
- A number of the original files for patched installer replaced (cracked PAINTER ), so the opportunity to integrate the updates in the distribution.
- The distribution integrated update for Adobe InDesign CC 2014 32-bit to version 10.2.0.69.
- The distribution integrated update for Adobe InDesign CC 2014 64-bit to version 10.2.0.69.
- The distribution is integrated with an update to Adobe Digital Publishing CC 2014 to version 32.0.0.
- The distribution is integrated utility Adobe Update Management Tool 8.0 (developed PAINTER ), which is able to set the "cloud" update.
- In the folder Crack in the image are a set of tools and detailed instructions to register the Adobe InDesign CC 2014.
- By kutsemu installer ESD-version added a menu similar to the Box-version. Made it in the image of the same menu for InDesign CS4.

Activation Instructions:

1. Break the connection to the network. To do this, either disconnect the network cable from the computer or software interrupt the connection. In Windows 7, for example, to program the connection is found in the system tray near the clock network icon, click on it, the pop-up window at the bottom, select "Control Center Network and Sharing" in the window on the left, click on "Change adapter settings "to change the rules of the select responsible for your Internet connection, click on the right mouse button and select" Disable. "
2. On behalf of the administrator run the patch Check_Disable.cmd (right-click on the file and select from the drop down menu "Run as administrator").
3. Start the installation of Adobe Indesign CC 2014 (file autoplay.exe ). In the Welcome window, select "Install" (Install). You will be prompted to connect to the service of Adobe Creative Cloud, using your Adobe ID. Press "Enter" (Sign In).
NOTE: If you want to install Adobe Update Management Tool, included in this package, but you UMT currently already is present in the system (for example, an earlier version) before starting the installation, you must remove the existing version of this already. Otherwise, the deployment of the entire package at some point will be forced interrupted, and the installation is complete!
4. After a few seconds, when the installer detects that it can not connect to the network, and the appropriate test will be stopped, displayed an error about unable to connect to the Internet. Press "Enter later" (Connect Later). Accept the license agreement and you will find yourself on the page, enter the serial number.
5. Run the keygen Activation_Keygen.exe , Generate with the help of a key for Adobe InDesign CC 2014, enter it in the appropriate field Installer Adobe InDesign CC 2014, and then click "Next" (Next).
NOTE: Either do not close the window keygens before you finish the installation and activation, or save somewhere in the key - he will still need!
6. After a few seconds, when the installer detects that it can not connect to the network, and the appropriate test will be stopped, displayed an error about unable to connect to the Internet to check the serial number. Click "Connect later" (Connect Later) and staff continue installing Adobe InDesign CC 2014 until its completion.
7. Run the installed Adobe InDesign CC 2014. opens check the serial number. A few seconds later, when the program detects that it can not connect to the network, check to be stopped. In the resulting window, among other things, will be a link "Unable to connect to the Internet?" (Having trouble connecting to the internet?). Click on it! In the window that opens, click the "offline activation" (Offline Activation), and in the next window, click "Generate Request Code" (Generate Request Code).
8. Again, go back to the keygens Activation_Keygen.exe and making sure that in the field of the generated Serial registered before you key in the Request copy "request code" (Request Code) from the window of the Autonomous activation. Then click GENERATE and the result of the field Activation drag the "response code" (Response Code) window Autonomous activation. Click the "Activate" (Activate) and complete the activation.
9. Restore the previously torn network connection and enjoy the registered version of the product! An alternative method (if the first did not work): 1. Break the connection to the network. To do this, either disconnect the network cable from the computer or software interrupt the connection. In Windows 7, for example, to program the connection is found in the system tray near the clock network icon, click on it, the pop-up window at the bottom, select "Control Center Network and Sharing" in the window on the left, click on "Change adapter settings "to change the rules of the select responsible for your Internet connection, click on the right mouse button and select" Disable. "



2. Start the installation of Adobe InDesign CC 2014 (file autoplay.exe ). In the Welcome window, select the "trial version" (Try). You will be prompted to connect to the service of Adobe Creative Cloud, using your Adobe ID. Press "Enter" (Sign In).
NOTE: If you want to install Adobe Update Management Tool, included in this package, but you UMT currently already is present in the system (for example, an earlier version) before starting the installation, you must remove the existing version of this already. Otherwise, the deployment of the entire package at some point will be forced interrupted, and the installation is complete!
3. After a few seconds, when the installer detects that it can not connect to the network, and the appropriate test will be stopped, displayed an error about unable to connect to the Internet. Press "Enter later" (Connect Later).
4. Accept the license agreement and continue the installation nominally Adobe InDesign CC 2014 until its completion.
5. After installation, run the patch adobe.snr.patch-painter.exe from folder Crack  Alternative , in the drop-down menu, select "Adobe InDesign CC 2014 (64-Bit)" or "Adobe InDesign CC 2014 (32-Bit)" and click Patch.
6. Restore the previously torn network connection and enjoy the registered version of the product!
